verses.verse: וְאֵ֣לֶּה ׀ <S%H428><s%> now these בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Now these [are] the children הַמְּדִינָ֗ה <S%H4082><s%> of the province הָֽעֹלִים֙ <S%H5927><s%> that went up מִשְּׁבִ֣י <S%H7628><s%> out of the captivity הַגּוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1473><s%> of those which had been carried away אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom הֶגְלָ֛ה <S%H1540><s%> had carried away [נְבוּכַדְנֶצֹּור כ] (נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֥ר <S%H5020><s%> Nebuchadnezzar ק) מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon לְבָבֶ֑ל <S%H894><s%> unto Babylon וַיָּשׁ֛וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> and came again לִירוּשָׁלִַ֥ם <S%H3389><s%> unto Jerusalem וִֽיהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> and Judah אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one לְעִירֽוֹ׃ <S%H5892><s%> unto his city

אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> These בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> Which came עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with זְרֻבָּבֶ֗ל <S%H2216><s%> with Zerubbabel יֵשׁ֡וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> Jeshua נְ֠חֶמְיָה <S%H5166><s%> Nehemiah שְׂרָיָ֨ה <S%H8304><s%> Seraiah רְֽעֵלָיָ֜ה <S%H7480><s%> Reelaiah מָרְדֳּכַ֥י <S%H4782><s%> Mordecai בִּלְשָׁ֛ן <S%H1114><s%> Bilshan מִסְפָּ֥ר <S%H4558><s%> Mispar בִּגְוַ֖י <S%H902><s%> Bigvai רְח֣וּם <S%H7348><s%> Rehum בַּעֲנָ֑ה <S%H1196><s%> Baanah מִסְפַּ֕ר <S%H4557><s%> The number אַנְשֵׁ֖י <S%H376><s%> of the men עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ס

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The children פַרְעֹ֔שׁ <S%H6551><s%> of Parosh אַלְפַּ֕יִם <S%H505><s%> two thousand מֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> seventy וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <S%H8147><s%> and two ס

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The children שְׁפַטְיָ֔ה <S%H8203><s%> of Shephatiah שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> seventy וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <S%H8147><s%> and two ס
בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The children אָרַ֔ח <S%H733><s%> of Arah שְׁבַ֥ע <S%H7651><s%> seven מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred חֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H2568><s%> and five וְשִׁבְעִֽים׃ <S%H7657><s%> seventy ס

בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> The children פַחַ֥ת מוֹאָ֛ב <S%H6355><s%> of Pahathmoab לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יֵשׁ֖וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> of Jeshua יוֹאָ֑ב <S%H3097><s%> [and] Joab אַלְפַּ֕יִם <S%H505><s%> two thousand שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> eight מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וּשְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten ס

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The children עֵילָ֔ם <S%H5867><s%> of Elam אֶ֕לֶף <S%H505><s%> a thousand מָאתַ֖יִם <S%H3967><s%> two hundred חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> fifty וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <S%H702><s%> and four ס
בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The children זַתּ֔וּא <S%H2240><s%> of Zattu תְּשַׁ֥ע <S%H8672><s%> nine מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וְאַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> forty וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H2568><s%> and five ס
